page.title: 02Social Survey in Meltham
page.content:
We carried out a{social survey }in both{schools}in{Meltham}and we found out the following information.
In{June 1985}in{Meltham,}the {majority}of families had{4}people living at home,only{one}had{7}or more and{13}had{2}people living at home.
{288}families in{Meltham}spent their {1984 holidays}in{Britain, 83}stayed at {home}and{129}went{abroad}for their {holidays.
{394}families had a{car}and{99}did not.
From the children we interviewed we found out that{218}children had lived in{Meltham}from being born and{283 had moved into the area.
